item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

11/26/2012's location will be:

Cave A' Vin

This Wine bar opened about a year ago.  Located on Upper State Street (next to C.O.Jones, across from J.P. Dempsey's) Cave A' Vin offers a selection of Wines by the Glass and Craft and Imported Beers by the bottle, to go along with a great cheese list and apps menu.  The decore is mostly a lounge type atmosphere, so if the Bar area isn't your thing then there are some comfy couches.

The Manager Linda will be generously offering us the following in ADDITION to thier normal happy hour specials:

$1 OFF Glasses of Wine (except House wine listed below.)

Some Complementary Sample Cheese Boards will be Served

Normal Happy Hour Specials also extended:

Select Appetizers $5 : Pine Nut or Red Peper Hummus, Queso Blano Dip, Artichoke & Spinach Dip, or Medley of Olives.

House Wine is $5 - Cardiff Chardonnay, Stella Pinot Grigio, Los Dos Grenache/Syrah, Searidge Cab Aauvignon, Terranoble Cab Sauvignon, Red or White Sangria, Holiday Spiced Wine, or Il Spriz Mionetto.

Beer - Modelo or Abbey De Leffe - $3

A.J. will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

Please RSVP for this event when able.  For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday (this place isn't too big).
